name: D.A.V.E. Against the Machine
description:
D.A.V.E. Against the Machine is as action/strategy game, inspired on classics like Bomberman. It was initially developed in 4 days for the GBJAM5, then I'm updating the game adding a versus mode, that is really fun.

In this game you play as D.A.V.E. in his quest to defeat the machine's Core.

For fulfill his quest, he is equipped with his GunByte that can alter the data blocks in the sectors he pass and his sword the "H4ck3r" that can destroy anything.

Commands:

GAMEPAD (RECOMMENDED)
Move: Left Analog
Shoot: A
Sword (requires ammo): X
Start: START
Restart Stage: BACK

Keyboard P1
Move: WASD
Shoot: G
Sword (requires ammo): H
Start: ENTER
Restart Stage: R

Keyboard P2
Move: ARROWS
Shoot: NUMKEY 0
Sword (requires ammo): NUMKEY Decimal Point ( . or , )


Future plans:

  • Random Generated stages.

Version v2.0 changelog:
- Added Versus Mode
